items.name: Geraldo
items.description: A series of small oval-shaped rocks named Geraldo. They appear to be sleeping. You can throw them at enemies.

items.name: Scroll of News News
items.description:
A worn-down, beat up scroll. It reads 'not yet news news: Connie and Balloony Tie Election!'
You can read the rest, but it seems too stupid to read.

items.name: Five Hundred Euros
items.description: A wad of colourful European banknotes, totalling 500. How it got here, nobody knows. Except for the fur salesman, but he only cares for furs.

items.name: Balloony's Corpse
items.description: A shriveled, deflated balloon. Can be inflated and used as a hot air balloon.

items.name: Moral Support
items.description: An incandescent, celestial orb. You feel instantly comfortable within its embrace.

items.name: Bottle of Water
items.description: A small flask, containing a sizeable amount of water. Your lips feel dry just looking at it.

items.name: Bandages
items.description: Three clean white patches of gauze. Can be used to improve health conditions in dire circumstances.

items.name: 1000 British Pounds
items.description: A crisp thousand-pound bill, straight from England. You have no idea how it got here.

items.name: Coonskin Hat
items.description: A designer cap made from the pelt and tail of a raccoon. Poor raccoon.

items.name: The Tome of Tableland
items.description: An antique, leather-bound logbook. There seems to be something written inside.

items.name: Alaskan Cheese
items.description: A morsel of the famed cheese native to Alaska. You can smell its fragrance; somehow, it smells loud and confusing.

items.name: Key of Friendship
items.description: A powerful, yet delicate brass key. It almost looks too pristine to use.

items.name: The Sword of Tableland
items.description: A noble obsidian longsword, forged with the strength of the gods. The handle is infused with glowing, ancient Tabelic. Your soul feels nourished by its strength.

items.name: The Shield of Tableland
items.description: An elegant Tabelic shield, crafted by the will of the gods. An ancient table motif adorns the front. Your soul feels satiated by its protection.
